story.title: #WorldCup
story.description: During the 2014 football #WorldCup, we posted pairs of Museum objects for each match for each country playing. Here's the whole collection!

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

image.caption: It’s #WorldCup time! Here’s a feather cap from #BRA and apron from #CRO http://t.co/FtEHRZ06Uy http://t.co/6QmMnSjdbh http://t.co/0DzgBc4hVp
